entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wiarton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:22 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -18.8°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High plus 2.
